Package factories.specification

Class AbstractEngineFactory

java.lang.Object
factories.specification.AbstractEngineFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EngineFactory
public abstract class AbstractEngineFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
This is the AbstractEngineFactory takes care of D.I in this project , providing us with every object we want
